note.p: Soldier. Son of Algernon and Marianne Elizabeth Langton. Ensign in the 66th Regiment, Forton Barracks, Alverstoke, Hampshire, 1841. Died in St John, Antigua, West Indies.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/388/11/3)
London, England, births and baptisms, 1813–1906 (Ancestry.com, accessed 4 September 2015)
Prerogative Court of Canterbury will registers (The National Archives: Public Record Office PROB 11/2182/213)
